bibl.title: Fletcher Decker v. State of Washington. In the Matter of Extradition of Fletcher Decker.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

div1.p: In the DISTRICT COURT of the UNITED STATES in and for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division
In Matter of Extradition of Fletcher Decker
FILED IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT Western District of Washington Northern Division TH NOV 9 1921 F. M. Harshberger, Clerk By D.E. Leitch
TUCKER & HYLAND ATTORNEYS FOR
Suite 207 Lowman Bldg. SEATTLE, WASH.
THE IVY PRESS, SEATTLE
SASKATCHEWAN PROVINCIAL POLICE.
WEYBUR DIVISION
GRAVELBOURG DEPARTMENT
October 12th 1921

STATEMENT of expenses incurred by Corporal Henry Lett Reg # 83 Sask Provincial Police Gravelbourg Detachment executing Warrant of Recipias upon John. M. Boyle United States Marshall. Seattle. Wash Re Extradition of Fletcher Decker. Theft & also attending Western District Court Seattle Wash 1921
Oct 4 I ticket CPR Moose Jaw to Vancouver & Return $ 73-15
" 4 I ticket CPR beat Vancouver to Seattle Wash and Return 13-48
" 4 I ticket CNR from G'bourg to Moose Jaw & Return 7-10
" 4 I Sleeper CNR from Moose Jaw to Vancouver 7-65
" 4 I Meal 9o I Meal $I-25 CPR Dining Car 2-15
" 5 I Meal 90c I Meal 90c I Meal $I-25 CPR Ding Car 3-05
" 6 I Meal 90c CPR Ding Car 90
" 6 I Meal $I-25 I meal $I-50 CPR Steam Ship 2-75
"6/7 Hire of Livery Auto from CPR Boat.Seattle to County Jail & Hotel & on 7th from Hotel to County Jail & US Marshalls Office 3-20
"6/7 I Bed $2-50 IMeal 85c Hotel Fyre Seattle Wash 3-35
"7/8 I Bed $2-50 I Meal 90c I Meal $ I-25 I Meal 90c 5-55
" 8 I Meal CPR Boat I-25
" 8 I Meal C.P.R. Dining Room Vancouver I-25
" 8 I Sleeper CPR from Vancouver to Moose Jaw 7-65
" 9 I Meal 90c I Meal 90c I Meal $I-25 CPR Dining Car 3-05
"10 I Meal 90c I Meal 90c CPR Ding Car I-80
"10/11 3Meals & I Bed For Hotel King George Moose Jaw 4-50
"11 I Meal 60c Cafe Avonlea 60
Exchange upon Canadian Money I-20 143-63
I Henry Lett Corporal SPP G'bourg make Oath and say that the whole of the above expediture was incurred upon Government business as stated and that each time of disbursement is correctly given
SWORN before me at Gravelburg Sask this 12th day of October AD 1921

W Lapland
Green Stamp A Justice of the Peace In & for the Province of Saskatchewan.
Corporal
